page.title: 02HOUSING IN GEISE AREA
page.content: CONSISTS OF SMALL HOUSING SCHEMES AND FARMS. THE LARGEST HOUSING SCHEME IS AT GLENGOLLY ON THE B874 WHICH CONSISTS OF 45 HOUSES. 36 OF THE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT BY THE LOCAL AUTHORITY ALTHOUGH QUITE A FEW OF THESE HAVE BEEN RECENTLY PURCHASED BY THE OCCUPANTS AND THE OTHER 9 WERE PRIVATELY BUILT. AT GEISE ON THE B874 THERE ARE 8 HOUSES AGAIN BUILT BY THE LOCAL AUTHORITY AND AGAIN ONE OF THESE HAS NOW BEEN PURCHASED BY THE OCCUPANT. THE OTHER SCHEME IS AT JANETSTOWN WHERE THERE IS A GROUP OF 16 LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSES, 3 OF WHICH HAVE BEEN PURCHASED BY THEIR OCCUPANTS. THE OTHER HOUSES AT JANETSTOWN ARE PRIVATELY OWNED.
